name: MRSATestsForMethicillinResistanceGene
title: MRSA (Tests for Methicillin Resistance Gene)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus gene),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: MRSA gene (mecA and mecC)),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
